personal_profile.name: Archana M
personal_profile.career_summary: Cloud Support Engineer with hands-on AWS RDS and CloudWatch experience, supporting enterprise customers at scale. Demonstrated ability to troubleshoot complex issues, educate non-technical stakeholders, and translate system metrics into actionable insights. Actively transitioning into Data Analytics, supported by certifications and applied metric-driven problem solving.

education.degree: Post Graduate Diploma in Human Resources Management
Certificate IV in Accounting and Bookkeeping

quantified_impact: Reproduced and isolated customer-reported issues in controlled lab environments, reducing misdiagnosis risk and accelerating root cause identification.
Guided customers through CloudWatch metrics analysis (CPU, memory, IOPS, latency), improving customer self-sufficiency in performance monitoring.
Resolved RDS upgrade and configuration issues by identifying deprecated instance classes and providing CLI-based workarounds.
Handled high-severity incidents requiring frequent customer updates and internal escalations, maintaining service trust during critical outages.

metrics_examples.customer_enablement: Conducted multiple screen-sharing sessions to help customers understand RDS performance metrics and error causes.
metrics_examples.troubleshooting_accuracy: Relied on environment reproduction as a primary method to distinguish AWS service issues from customer misconfiguration.
metrics_examples.cross_team_collaboration: Raised internal bugs and feature requests based on repeated customer pain points.

quantified_impact: Delivered customer reporting solutions by converting ambiguous business requirements into technically feasible designs.
Reduced customer rework cycles by introducing prototype-based validation before full development.
Improved requirement clarity and stakeholder alignment by visually demonstrating report outputs.

metrics_examples.requirement_validation: Used prototype-driven discussions to gain early customer sign-off.
metrics_examples.delivery_efficiency: Minimized late-stage requirement changes through early visualization.

quantified_impact: Provided enterprise application consulting with a focus on functional accuracy and customer satisfaction.
Supported enterprise application workflows and ensured operational continuity.
Developed and optimized SQL and PL/SQL queries, procedures, and reports for enterprise systems.
Supported technical migrations by validating data integrity and query performance.

metrics_examples.technical_support: Resolved customer issues related to query logic and database behavior using prior development experience.

behavioral.question: How do you differentiate between customer misconfiguration and an AWS service issue?

answer_star.situation: Customers often reported errors without clarity on root cause.
answer_star.task: Determine whether the issue originated from AWS services or customer configuration.
action: Reproduced the issue in a lab environment
Matched customer configuration as closely as possible
Validated behavior against expected service outcomes
answer_star.result: Accurate root cause identification and confident escalation or resolution guidance.

behavioral.question: Describe a time you enabled a non-technical customer.

answer_star.situation: Customers lacked visibility into database performance and error causes.
answer_star.task: Enable customers to independently monitor and understand RDS health.
action: Used screen sharing to navigate CloudWatch dashboards
Explained instance class limits and read/write capacity
Shared step-by-step documentation and internal knowledge articles
answer_star.result: Customers gained confidence in interpreting metrics and reduced repeat support queries.

behavioral.question: Tell me about a time you went beyond your role.

answer_star.situation: AWS support scope excludes coding assistance.
answer_star.task: Unblock customers without violating role boundaries.
action: Used prior SQL and PL/SQL experience
Guided customers through query logic rather than writing full solutions
answer_star.result: Customers resolved blockers while support boundaries were maintained.

behavioral.question: Describe a time you handled a high-severity incident.

answer_star.situation: A critical production outage impacted multiple customers and degraded service availability.
answer_star.task: Coordinate an immediate response to restore service and communicate clearly with stakeholders.
action: Assembled a cross-functional incident response team and established a war room
Reproduced the issue in a controlled environment to isolate the fault
Implemented a rollback and temporary mitigations while engineering developed a permanent fix
Provided regular, transparent updates to affected customers and internal stakeholders
answer_star.result: Service was restored within the SLA window, customer impact was minimized, and post-incident actions reduced recurrence risk.

behavioral.question: Give an example of influencing product improvements from customer feedback.

answer_star.situation: Multiple customers reported recurring pain points caused by a missing platform feature.
answer_star.task: Collect evidence and advocate for a product change to address the root cause.
action: Collated customer cases and reproducible steps to demonstrate the issue
Filed a detailed internal bug/feature request with impact analysis
Collaborated with product and engineering teams to prioritize and scope a fix
Worked with documentation to ensure customers received guidance during rollout
answer_star.result: The feature was implemented in a subsequent release, lowering support ticket volume and improving customer satisfaction.

technical.question: How does your cloud experience support your transition into data analytics?

points: Daily interpretation of CloudWatch metrics and trends
Correlation of performance data to customer impact
Experience explaining numerical insights to non-technical stakeholders
Hands-on data cleaning and visualization during certification projects

evidence: Strong numerical reasoning and pattern recognition
